meanings: to exceed (esp. figures: profits, unemployment rate, etc.)

lessons.japanese: もちろん利潤は生産費を上回るべきです。
lessons.english: Benefits of course should exceed the costs.

lessons.japanese: 上位２社で市場の５０％を上回るシェアを占めている。
lessons.english: Between them, the two largest companies account for a share of more than 50% of the market.

lessons.japanese: 所得税は控除額を上回るいかなる所得にもかかる。
lessons.english: An income tax is levied on any income that exceeds deductions.

lessons.japanese: 私の怒りは私がいだき続けた愛を遥かに上回るだろう。
lessons.english: My wrath shall far exceed the love I ever bore.

lessons.japanese: もちろん利潤は生産費を上回るべきです。
lessons.english: Benefits of course should exceed the costs.

lessons.japanese: この街に働く人の数は月末までに1000人を上回るだろう。
lessons.english: The number of the people working in this city will be more than one thousand by the end of this month.

lessons.japanese: 私達は予想を上回る金額を使ってしまった。
lessons.english: We spent more money than was expected.

lessons.japanese: 私の怒りは私がいだき続けた愛を遥かに上回るだろう。
lessons.english: My wrath shall far exceed the love I ever bore.

lessons.japanese: 所得税は控除額を上回るいかなる所得にもかかる。
lessons.english: An income tax is levied on any income that exceeds deductions.

lessons.japanese: 上位２社で市場の５０％を上回るシェアを占めている。
lessons.english: Between them, the two largest companies account for a share of more than 50% of the market.

lessons.japanese: この街に働く人の数は月末までに1000人を上回るだろう。
lessons.english: The number of the people working in this city will be more than one thousand by the end of this month.

lessons.japanese: 山頂からの眺めは、期待をはるかに上回るものだった。
lessons.english: The view from the mountain top far surpassed our expectations.

lessons.japanese: 山頂からの眺めは、期待をはるかに上回るものだった。
lessons.english: The view from the mountain top far surpassed our expectations.
